block.p: LEAD: These are other projects planned or under construction on the New Jersey shore of the Hudson River: JERSEY CITY
LEAD: These are other projects planned or under construction on the New Jersey shore of the Hudson River: JERSEY CITY
These are other projects planned or under construction on the New Jersey shore of the Hudson River: JERSEY CITY
Port Liberte - 1,700 condominiums and town houses under construction, with 1 million square feet of offices, stores and a hotel planned.
Harsimus Cove - 1,500 condominiums, 750,000 square feet of office, retail and hotel space planned.
Newport - 9,000 homes, 4.5 million square feet of offices, a shopping mall, hotel and marina under construction. HOBOKEN
Hudson Center - 1,200 condominiums, 4 million square feet of office space, stores, a hotel and marina planned. WEEHAWKEN
Lincoln Center - 250 homes, 2 million square feet of office space, stores, a hotel and a marina under construction.
Arcorp Properties - 12,500 condominiums, 10 million square feet of office space, stores, a hotel and a marina planned. NORTH BERGEN
Roc Harbor - 700 condominiums and a marina under construction. EDGEWATER
Shelter Bay Club - 60 condominiums under construction.
